<p>We have created a <strong>bibliography of OSC members’ open science and meta-research work</strong>, which you can access as an <a href="https://www.resources.osc.lmu.de/bibliography/">interactive webpage</a>, an online <a href="https://www.zotero.org/groups/5213376/lmuopensciencecenter_memberspublications/library">Zotero library</a>, or a pdf which you can download below.</p>
<p>We hope this will <strong>inspire further collaborations </strong>between our members, provide resources for journal clubs in your respective units, and showcase the emergence of the meta-research field!</p>
